Plot: Two 1990s teenagers find themselves in a 1950s sitcom where their influence begins to profoundly change that complacent world.
Title: Pleasantville
Actors: Tobey Maguire, Reese Witherspoon, William H. Macy, Joan Allen
tomatoConsensus: Filled with lighthearted humor, timely social commentary, and dazzling visuals, Pleasantville is an artful blend of subversive satire and well-executed Hollywood formula.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 17 wins & 41 nominations.
